name: Income at IETC full credit threshold
description: Individual earning exactly NZD 66,000 per year (full IETC credit, no abatement)

sources.description: Calculated using 2025-26 PAYE rates, ACC levy, and IETC from IRD
sources.notes: PAYE: 10.5% up to $15,600 + 17.5% up to $53,500 + 30% up to $78,100. ACC: 1.67%. IETC: Full $520 (at threshold where abatement starts).
